MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:00am to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network located on Clarendon Crescent and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29am on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
